channel.title: Hybrid pvp Problem with Player vs. players
channel.description:
When i tryed to pk some other player i was using range and he was using meele. I didnt do damage to him but he did damage to me? Its the same for mage. If a player has mage and the other has range they both dont deal any damage to eachother. But it works when a player has mage and the other player is using meele. And in the cmd prompt for run it says when i use range and mage against players. [code] [7/19/12 10:04 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:188) [7/19/12 10:04 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 33 [7/19/12 10:04 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.playerDelayedHit (CombatAssistant.java:1612) [7/19/12 10:04 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1377)
[7/19/12 10:04 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:164) [7/19/12 10:04 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:188) [/code] Not sure what to do at this point. Just need it to fix that problem. I thank the people who try to help me fix this.

item.title: Hybrid pvp Problem with Player vs. players
item.dc:creator: @dannymoparscape dannymoparscape
item.description:
@dannymoparscape wrote:

i have my hybrid pvp cleaned and in edit
no problems like you.

Read full topic
item.source: Hybrid pvp Problem with Player vs. players

item.title: Hybrid pvp Problem with Player vs. players
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“blddyboy, post:1, topic:450422”]When i tryed to pk some other player i was using range and he was using meele. I didnt do damage to him but he did damage to me? Its the same for mage. If a player has mage and the other has range they both dont deal any damage to eachother. But it works when a player has mage and the other player is using meele. And in the cmd prompt for run it says when i use range and mage against players.

[7/19/12 10:04 PM]:     at server.Server.main(Server.java:188)
[7/19/12 10:04 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 33
[7/19/12 10:04 PM]:     at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.playerDelayedHit
(CombatAssistant.java:1612)
[7/19/12 10:04 PM]:     at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1377)

[7/19/12 10:04 PM]:     at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand
ler.java:164)
[7/19/12 10:04 PM]:     at server.Server.main(Server.java:188)

Not sure what to do at this point. Just need it to fix that problem. I thank the people who try to help me fix this.[/quote]
As Team_Rocket stated you should look at your delays. Also make sure to look at your combat methods. Like the way you say it I think there’s a problem with your ranging. You should take a look at the methods that handles ranging.

Read full topic
item.source: Hybrid pvp Problem with Player vs. players

item.title: Hybrid pvp Problem with Player vs. players
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

It can be multiple problems. The first thing you should check are your Delays.

Read full topic
